chat_history.message:
Hello,

The parcel with tracking number 40413109 could not be delivered due to an incorrect or incomplete address.

Please provide us with the correct address, the recipient's name, and phone number. Alternatively, you may ask the carrier to reschedule the delivery.

Thank you.

Regards
Mandi Xhaferaj

Dear ecomobile,

My name is Angie, nice to meet you! I hope this message finds you amazing.

The customer reported that he received the package 10 days ago, please confirm that you have not placed the wrong order. Thank you so much!

Have a lovely day!
Angie, from Back Market Customer Care.

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this, we will get back with our logistics partner. May we check if the customer had received the correct order? Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile,

I hope this message finds you amazing.

Yes, the customer reported that he received the package 10 days ago. Thanks a lot!

Have a good day!
Angie, from Back Market Customer Care.

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for your assistance in this case. If no further assistance is required, kindly help us to close the case, thank you.

Regards,
YR
